subject: Swimming
lead_paragraph: Thiago Pereira of Brazil and Stefan Nystrand of Sweden set world records at the short-course Arena World Cup in Berlin. Pereira swam the men’s 200-meter medley in 1 minute 53.14 seconds, beating the 1:53.31 set by Ryan Lochte of the United States in 2006. Nystrand finished the 100 freestyle in 20.93, 0.05 faster than the mark Roland Schoeman of South Africa set in 2006.
